title: Tales of the Unexpected: Italy’s First Tour De France Start Is the 100th Anniversary of Its First Tour Champion
content:
Over the next three weeks, John Wilcockson, who has reported 45 Tours de France, will focus on unexpected happenings at this year’s race.

Read the full article at Tales of the Unexpected: Italy’s First Tour De France Start Is the 100th Anniversary of Its First Tour Champion  on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
